text: man-il geudeul-i neohuiwa deobul-eo chuljeonhayeossdamyeon geudeul-eun neohuiege haeag-eul kkichil ppun-imyeo neohui gaunde haeag-eul beonjige hago neohuileul gyolanke hayeoss-eul geos-imyeo neohui gaundeneun geu deul-ege gwileul giul-injado iss-eoss-eulila geuleona hananim-eun umaehan jadeul eul algo gyesieossnola
